video.name: Vegan Boston Cream Pie Parfaits - VeganRicha.com
video.description:
Easy Vegan Boston Cream Pie Pudding Parfaits.
Recipe here : http://www.veganricha.com/2017/01/vegan-boston-cream-pie-pudding.html

Layers of almond vanilla custard and smooth chocolate ganache. Soy-free, easily made nut-free, gluten-free. .


****************************************­*******

recipeIngredient: 1.5 cups cashew milk  (or use coconut milk or soy milk)
1 tbsp white flour (use cornstarch to make gluten-free)
1/2 cup full fat or lite coconut milk (or use any other non dairy milk)
1 cup vegan semi sweet chocolate chips

recipeInstructions.text: Heat 1 cup cashew milk or other non dairy milk over medium heat. Add vanilla, almond extracts, salt and sweetener.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat 1 cup cashew milk or other non dairy milk over medium heat. Add vanilla, almond extracts, salt and sweetener.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix the cornstarch and flour in 1/2 cup milk until well mixed. Pour into the simmering milk. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to medium low. Simmer for 3 to 4 minutes. Taste and adjust sweet and almond flavor (add more sweet or almond extract and mix in while still hot).
recipeInstructions.name: Mix the cornstarch and flour in 1/2 cup milk until well mixed. Pour into the simmering milk. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to medium low. Simmer for 3 to 4 minutes. Taste and adjust sweet and almond flavor (add more sweet or almond extract and mix in while still hot).

recipeInstructions.text: Heat coconut milk over medium heat. When hot, add chocolate chips, vanilla and sweetener if using.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat coconut milk over medium heat. When hot, add chocolate chips, vanilla and sweetener if using.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix for a minute and take of heat. Continue to mix until all the chocolate dissolves and the mixture is smooth. Cool for 10 mins
recipeInstructions.name: Mix for a minute and take of heat. Continue to mix until all the chocolate dissolves and the mixture is smooth. Cool for 10 mins

recipeInstructions.text: Pour 2 tbsp chocolate mixture in individual serve cups. Add a layer of the almond vanilla pudding, Then add another layer of chocolate and so on. Garnish with shaved chocolate or shredded coconut. Add layers of rushed vanilla wafers or slice of vanilla sponge cake to make parfaits. Chill for 15 mins to half an hour and serve.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour 2 tbsp chocolate mixture in individual serve cups. Add a layer of the almond vanilla pudding, Then add another layer of chocolate and so on. Garnish with shaved chocolate or shredded coconut. Add layers of rushed vanilla wafers or slice of vanilla sponge cake to make parfaits. Chill for 15 mins to half an hour and serve.
